amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a report to Congress containing assessments of risks and shortfalls along with recommendations regarding cybersecurity at most at-risk ports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a report to Congress containing assessments of risks and shortfalls along with recommendations regarding cybersecurity at most at risk ports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hahn amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Hahn.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
